text: A military-overseas ballot must include or be accompanied by a declaration signed by the voter that a material misstatement of fact in completing the ballot may be grounds for a conviction of making a false statement under the laws of the District.
historical:

For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 13 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

subchapter.text: Accommodations for Military and Overseas Voters.
